paper_abstract: This paper presents the prediction of milling tool-path strategy using Artificial Neural Network (ANN), by taking the predefined technological objectives into account. In the presented case, the best possible surface quality of a machined surface was taken as the primary technological aim. This paper shows how feature extraction from a 3D CAD model, and classification using a self-organizing neural network, are done. The experimental results presented in this paper suggest that the prediction of milling strategy using the self-organizing neural network (SOM) is effective.
paper_title: Intelligent prediction of milling strategy using neural networks
